column5: Our midcentury modern ranch house is located in a quiet residential area of Oak Cliff a few minutes' drive (or bike ride) from the Bishop Arts District. Your freshly painted upstairs guest room has a queen-size bed, weight machine, desk, closet, and you'll have your own bathroom plus access to a full kitchen, dining area, living room, entertainment center, and washer and dryer downstairs. It's good for couples and solo travelers.
column8: Guest bedroom and bathroom in quiet part of O.C.
